step_of_the_day.title: Step of the Day:Hold the intention and take responsibility to be happy sometime today (Pillars #1 & 6)
step_of_the_day.content:
"Whoever is happy will make others happy too." Anne FrankThe lessons we learn growing up are countless. Even how we ground ourselves emotionally is, to a great
            extent, learned. For example, we might learn how to be anxious by living with an anxious parent. This is
            also true of depression. Many who are depressed, simply never learned how to be happy. They didn’t
            experience enough of it growing up, as they learned to focus more on their depression. If you are focused on
            whether you are depressed, it will distract you from noticing when you are happy.

action_step:
Take responsibility today to find something to be happy about. If you have difficulty, try to identify
            what’s getting in your way. Usually it’s a message from your old and negative internal parent with some
            judgment or worry. If you notice this, try to shift, and come from the healthy voice we are working on
            developing. How does this support feeling happy?
journal_entry: Write about your relationship with happiness.
